description: A manufactured plush toy.  This is the default variant, if you see it something went wrong.

variants.description: A mass-produced plush teddy bear.  It is wearing a little red t-shirt but no pants.

A dark green teddy bear with stylized stitches all over and X's for eyes.  The perfect size for a small child to hug the unlife out of.  Looks like the zombie apocalypse hit the toy store shelves first.
A large plush ferret with cute beady eyes.
A velvety-soft plush penguin.  It makes a funny noise when you hug it.
A large plush remora, a fish commonly seen alongside sharks.  Wait, wasn't there a shark plushie somewhere hereâ€¦
A large plush fox.  It isn't realistic enough to trick a zombie into going after it, but it's very cute and makes a comforting bedtime companion.

description: A somewhat large, mass produced shark plushie.  Meant to provide comfort to people of all ages.
A large manufactured figurine.  This is the default variant, if you see it something went wrong.

variants.description: A relatively large plastic figurine of a T-rex.

description: A normal-sized manufactured figurine.  This is the default variant, if you see it something went wrong.

variants.description: A figurine of some unnamed swordsman, covered with scars and equipped with sturdy leather armor.  Seems to be ready to fight.
A plastic figurine of a young woman.  She's meant to be dressed up and accessorized with a wide variety of clothing, sold separately.
A plastic figurine with a nightmarish, scarred face.  He wears a hat and has three long blades extending from a glove on the back of his hand.
A figurine of a blue unicorn.  It is in a sitting position, shyly covering both eyes with its front hooves.
A figurine of a scaly green swamp monster emerging from some fetid lagoon.

Your heart leaps to your throat as you see the face of Death itself staring back at you, scythe raised for the harvest!  You relax significantly once you realize it's only a few inches tall and made of plastic.

A figurine of a redheaded mermaid sitting on a rock.  Like in the film this toy is based on, she gazes longingly out to a world she wants to be a part of - or she would be, but the face isn't drawn very well and doesn't express much emotion at all.
A plastic figurine of an anthropomorphic avocado, holding a salt shaker and a spoon.  Makes a great gift for the guacamole lover in your life, or as a decoration for your kitchen.
A superhero action figure.  Its limbs can be adjusted for different poses, and it is designed to do battle against a wide variety of crooks and supervillains, sold separately.

description: A simple yoyo on a string.  Now you can be bored with style.
A fidget spinner.  An artifact from when the times were simpler.
